item.title: Installed Go in Mac OS 10.5
item.description: Yes, I know it: it is easy. But I will be doing a wipe and reinstall of my MacBook, and when I need to reinstall everything I want a place to check for the steps I did. I found almost all tips needed here. The first step is checking for Mercurial (wikipedia) in your system. Open a terminal and type hg version If your terminal complains about command not found, you don’t have Mercurial installed.
